thread.title: Scalebound was canceled 8 years ago today
thread.title_full: Scalebound was canceled 8 years ago today

author: Gunman
title: Scalebound was canceled 8 years ago today
text:
[View: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RR4c3wsFsMM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RR4c3wsFsMM)
[
Microsoft Confirms Scalebound is Cancelled - IGN
](https://www.ign.com/articles/2017/01/09/microsoft-confirms-scalebound-is-cancelled)
As rumors earlier today suggested, Microsoft has confirmed that development on Scalebound has ceased.
www.ign.com
A Microsoft representative provided the following statement to IGN:
"After careful deliberation, Microsoft Studios has come to the decision to end production for Scalebound. We're working hard to deliver an amazing lineup of games to our fans this year, including Halo Wars 2, Crackdown 3, State of Decay 2, Sea of Thieves and other great experiences."
What did you think of the Kamiya-led Platinum game that wasn't? Was it a potential gem in the making or was nothing of value lost?
